tests.input: ALTER TABLE my_tab ADD COLUMN b STRING COMMENT "abc" NOT NULL COMMENT "abc"
tests.exception:
[ALTER_TABLE_COLUMN_DESCRIPTOR_DUPLICATE] ALTER TABLE ADD column b specifies descriptor "COMMENT" more than once, which is invalid.(line 1, pos 62)

== SQL ==
ALTER TABLE my_tab ADD COLUMN b STRING COMMENT "abc" NOT NULL COMMENT "abc"
--------------------------------------------------------------^^^

tests.input: ALTER TABLE my_tab ADD COLUMN b STRING DEFAULT "123" NOT NULL DEFAULT "abc"
tests.exception:
[ALTER_TABLE_COLUMN_DESCRIPTOR_DUPLICATE] ALTER TABLE ADD column b specifies descriptor "DEFAULT" more than once, which is invalid.(line 1, pos 62)

== SQL ==
ALTER TABLE my_tab ADD COLUMN b STRING DEFAULT "123" NOT NULL DEFAULT "abc"
--------------------------------------------------------------^^^

tests.input: ALTER TABLE my_tab ADD COLUMN b STRING FIRST COMMENT "abc" AFTER y
tests.exception:
[ALTER_TABLE_COLUMN_DESCRIPTOR_DUPLICATE] ALTER TABLE ADD column b specifies descriptor "FIRST|AFTER" more than once, which is invalid.(line 1, pos 59)

== SQL ==
ALTER TABLE my_tab ADD COLUMN b STRING FIRST COMMENT "abc" AFTER y
-----------------------------------------------------------^^^

tests.input: ALTER TABLE my_tab ADD COLUMN b STRING NOT NULL DEFAULT "abc" NOT NULL
tests.exception:
[ALTER_TABLE_COLUMN_DESCRIPTOR_DUPLICATE] ALTER TABLE ADD column b specifies descriptor "NOT NULL" more than once, which is invalid.(line 1, pos 62)

== SQL ==
ALTER TABLE my_tab ADD COLUMN b STRING NOT NULL DEFAULT "abc" NOT NULL
--------------------------------------------------------------^^^

output.failure: invalid argument: duplicate NOT NULL clause
